sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import Message from '../components/Message' import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import FormContainer from "../components/FormContainer" import { getOrderDetails } from '../actions/orderActions' import Loader from '../components/Loader' function OrderScreen() { const { orderId } = useParams() const dispatch = useDispatch(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const orderDetails = useSelector((state) => state.orderDetails); const { order, error, loading } = orderDetails; const userLogin = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin); const { userInfo } = userLogin; if(!loading && !error) { order.itemsPrice = order.orderItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0).toFixed(2) } function handleClick() { window.location.href = '/' } useEffect(() => { if(!order || order._id !== Number(orderId)) { dispatch(getOrderDetails(orderId)) } }, [order, orderId]) return loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : (

Order #{order._id}

Shipping

Shipping: {order.shippingAddress.address}, {order.shippingAddress.city}, {' '} {order.shippingAddress.country}, {' '} {order.shippingAddress.postalCode}.

Payment Method

Method: {order.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{order.orderItems.length === 0 ? (
Go Back Order is empty
) : ( {order.orderItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} X ${item.price} = ${(item.qty * item.price).toFixed(2)} ))} ) }

Order Summary

 Items: ${order.itemsPrice} Shipping (over 50$ - free): ${order.shippingPrice} Tax (9%): ${order.taxPrice} Total: ${order.totalPrice}
) } export default OrderScreen
